skins.shipDescription: Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser C Helena, Hull Number CL-50!
skins.selfIntroduction: I was designed to be on par with heavy cruisers, but just my power alone isn't enough to save everyone... Commander, can you help me?
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, Commander. I'm Helena. My strong suit is enemy reconnaissance. Please... guide us towards victory.
skins.login: ... Ah, welcome back, Commander. Sorry, I was just brooding over something.
skins.details: I can't rely on this thing alone...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you trying to hide, Commander? No matter where you hide, I know where you are.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, what should we do after the war?
skins.secretaryIdle3: If only my guns could be as strong as my radar...
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? I'm fine. I'm just... a little distracted.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If this makes you feel good, then... I'm fine with it.

skins.shipDescription: This new equipment... might take some time to get used to... N-no, I'm sure I can handle it now! Commander, Helena will... meet your expectations!
skins.acquisition: This new equipment... might take some time to get used to... N-no, I'm sure I can handle it now! Commander, Helena will... meet your expectations!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Let's get to work and do our best.
skins.details: St. Louis always praises me like, "my, how you've grown" whenever I do anything... It's kind of embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You want to know what my new and improved SG is capable of? All right... Find a place to hide that nobody knows about. Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I think everyone would be better off living in the present without regrets than spend every day anxious about the future.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's not enough to focus only on improving my equipment. I need to become stronger to use it properly, too.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You really can't go around doing this, Commander!

skins.shipDescription: I... want to be part of the new year festivities too. Oh, you don't have to worry about me. I'm no longer the fledgling I once was.
skins.acquisition: I... want to be part of the new year festivities too. Oh, you don't have to worry about me. I'm no longer the fledgling I once was.
skins.login: It seems the New Year's spirit has swept over the entire fleet.
skins.details: St. Louis must've had a lot of fun making me try out so many clothes... Do you really think I look cute this way, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: My New Year's wish is... that I'll be more courageous and positive, and that no harm will come to any of my friends...
skins.secretaryIdle2: For this year's shrine visit, the whole Brooklyn-class, Cleveland, and her Knights of The Sea all went there together as one big family.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's snowing... I never realized how peaceful and beautiful snow can be.
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? I was just thinking about what I should do during New Year's... There are so many things I want to do.

skins.shipDescription: Um, Commander, could we... share a dance? I have things I want to tell you...
skins.acquisition: Um, Commander, could we... share a dance? I have things I want to tell you...
skins.login: Commander, the party is about to start.
skins.details: In preparation for today, I got St. Louis to teach me how to dance. She laughed a lot at me, telling me I'm "such a klutz"... Ahah.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you know something? It's thanks to you that I've become as cheerful as I am now. Ahah~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm not going to be scared or hesitate ever again because you and my friends are always with me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My dance partner will be... No, it'll just be you, Commander. I have so many things I want to tell you.
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm all ready, Commander. Shall we dance?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek?! ... Ah, sorry, did I step on your foot, Commander?
